naslov: ***Luksuzna vila u izgradnji, 237m2- otvoren pogled na more*** (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo pri prodaji luksuzne vile u izgradnji s otvorenim pogledom na more i otoke. Nalazi se na parceli površine 659m2. Proteže se na dvije etaže, a sastoji se četiri spavaće sobe, radne sobe, pet kupaonica, dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom te dvije terase. Nalazi se na mirnoj lokaciji čime pruža potpunu intimu, a u blizini su Trogir, Split, zračna luka te svi potrebni sadržaji. Pripada joj bazen (7x4) s kojeg se također pruža prekrasan pogled na more i otoke. Predviđeni završetak gradnje je 08./2023. U neposrednoj blizini nalazi se parcela površine 396m2 koja pripada vili. Vila pruža odličnu mogućnost kao turistička investicija ili za miran, luksuzan obiteljski život. Za sve detaljnije informacije molimo obratite se agenciji. 21stCENTURY - profesionalan pristup & provjerene nekretnine NAPOMENA: Agencijska provizija za kupca: 3 % We mediate the sale of a luxury villa under construction with an open view of the sea and islands. It is located on a plot of 659m2. It extends over two floors and consists of four bedrooms, a study, five bathrooms, a living room with a kitchen and a dining room, and two terraces. It is located in a quiet location, which provides complete intimacy, and nearby are Trogir, Split, the airport and all the necessary facilities. It has a swimming pool (7x4) with a beautiful view of the sea and the islands. The planned completion of construction is August 2023. In the immediate vicinity there is a plot of 396m2 that belongs to the villa. The villa offers an excellent opportunity as a tourist investment or for a quiet, luxurious family life. More info: 21ST CENTURY professional service & verified real estate 21.REAL ESTATE & TOURISM CENTURY d.o.o. www.21stcroatia.com Marmontova 5 21 000 Split CROATIA NOTE: Agency commission for the buyer: 3%
